YOUtilities

An utility website containing smaller web applications for daily use

YOUtilities was made to improve time management by allowing users to have access to smaller web tools all at one place that are used almost daily and have better user interface and experience with innovative neumorphic design.

PassLock

A personal password managing website with security

PassLock helps me to save passwords and IDs from several different accounts. It is quite secure as the javascript files are obfuscated so that the code in non readable and the passwords remain safe.

Star Wars : Naval Supremacy

An Indie developer game

Developed using Unity 3D and C#, Star Wars: Naval Supremacy is a fan made indie game for PC supporting Windows 10 platforms and is inspired from the famous Star Wars franchise.
